1678203137.description: Represents a collection of groups of items in a category..

category_name.description: The category that the items will go to. This is restricted to construction, nature, equipment, or items.
category_name.title: CraftingCatalogItemCategory

groups.description: The groups that we are adding to a category.

items.description: Represents a group of items. A group can be collapsible if it is provided with a group identifier, or added a set of loose items without an icon.

1678203137.title: Crafting Catalog Category

2254328111.description: The identifier of a group of items.

icon.description: The item or block that represents the group.

name.description: A localization key representing the name of the group that starts with a namespace. The 'minecraft' namespace is reservered for the Vanilla game. Creating new group names starting with 'minecraft' run the risk of being overwritten in later updates.

2254328111.title: Crafting Catalog Group Icon

name.description: The name of an item or block. A namespace for the item is required. You can optionally provide an aux value for items that use it at the end. Example: namespace:my_item:1

3571599612.description: Represents a group of items. A group can be collapsible if it is provided with a group identifier, or added a set of loose items without an icon.

group_identifier.description: Optional field to give an icon and name to a group. Otherwise the items are added as loose items.

items.description: The items to add to the group.

3571599612.title: Crafting Catalog Group

description: The root object for defining the crafting catalog

categories.description: The categories we are adding groups to.

items.description: Represents a collection of groups of items in a category..

title: Crafting Catalog Document
